price: Hawataweza kuwasaidia. Bali hao ndio watakuwa askari wao watakao hudhurishwa.
arabic: لَا يَسۡتَطِيعُونَ نَصۡرَهُمۡ وَهُمۡ لَهُمۡ جُندٞ مُّحۡضَرُونَ
footnotes: Hiyo miungu ya uwongo haiwezi kuwasaidia kwa lolote Mwenyezi Mungu akiwatakia madhara. Kwani miungu hiyo haiwezi kunafiisha wala kudhuru. Bali wao kwa hiyo miungu isiyo weza kitu, ni kama askari walio tayarishwa kwa ajili ya kuwakhudumia na wa kuwalinda na madhara.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: lā yastaṭīʿūna naṣrahum wahum lahum jundun muḥ'ḍarūna
